trans-unit.source: An 'Abbreviation' associates a short form to a given term. The abbreviation may be defined for a specific language.
trans-unit.target: An 'Abbreviation' associates a short form to a given term. The abbreviation may be defined for a specific language.

trans-unit.source: Defined abbreviations are used in the htmlArea RTE Abbreviation dialogue. A defined abbreviation may further be configured so as to be made available only when editing content in a given language.
trans-unit.target: Defined abbreviations are used in the htmlArea RTE Abbreviation dialogue. A defined abbreviation may further be configured so as to be made available only when editing content in a given language.

trans-unit.source: Enter the term to be abbreviated.
trans-unit.target: Enter the term to be abbreviated.

trans-unit.source: Enter the short form of the term.
trans-unit.target: Enter the short form of the term.

trans-unit.source: Check this option if you wish to disable the availability of this entry to non-admin users.
trans-unit.target: Check this option if you wish to disable the availability of this entry to non-admin users.

trans-unit.source: A defined abbreviation may be of two types: abbreviation or acronym. These correspond to HTML elements abbr and acronym. Note however that acronym is deprecated in recent versions of HTML.
trans-unit.target: A defined abbreviation may be of two types: abbreviation or acronym. These correspond to HTML elements abbr and acronym. Note however that acronym is deprecated in recent versions of HTML.

trans-unit.source: Enter a time at which you want the abbreviation to start being available to non-admin users. If no time is specified, the abbreviation becomes immediately available to the users of the RTE, if not hidden.
trans-unit.target: Enter a time at which you want the abbreviation to start being available to non-admin users. If no time is specified, the abbreviation becomes immediately available to the users of the RTE, if not hidden.

trans-unit.source: Enter a date and time at which you want the abbreviation to stop being available to non-admin users. If no time is specified, the abbreviation is indefinitely available to the users of the RTE, unless it is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Enter a date and time at which you want the abbreviation to stop being available to non-admin users. If no time is specified, the abbreviation is indefinitely available to the users of the RTE, unless it is hidden.

trans-unit.source: Select the language of content elements in which the abbreviation may be used.
trans-unit.target: Select the language of content elements in which the abbreviation may be used.

trans-unit.source: Select the language for which the abbreviation is defined.
trans-unit.target: Select the language for which the abbreviation is defined.

trans-unit.source: The selected language will be used as the value of the language attribute of the HTML element inserted in the content element by the RTE.
trans-unit.target: The selected language will be used as the value of the language attribute of the HTML element inserted in the content element by the RTE.
